subject: Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Homosexuality and Bisexuality
lead_paragraph: The selection of Michael Sam by the St. Louis Rams late in the final round of the N.F.L. draft may have saved the league from another public relations problem.
snippet: The selection of Michael Sam by the St. Louis Rams late in the final round of the N.F.L. draft may have saved the league from another public relations problem.
